# Welcome

I am a Data Analyst working at [UF Health Integrated Data Repository](https://idr.ufhealth.org/). My work primarily focuses on designing and developing data science pipelines to improve the coverage and quality of the data, primarily for the [OneFlorida+ Clinical Research Consortium](https://onefloridaconsortium.org/). In my current role, I work on common data models like [OMOP](https://ohdsi.github.io/CommonDataModel/) and [PCORNET](https://pcornet.org/news/resources-pcornet-common-data-model/). Additionally, I also help research at UF by providing consultation for research teams, supporting feasibility and cohort discovery, and receiving and fulfilling research data requests.

# Work

##### [Data Management Analyst III]{.underline}

*UF Health Office of Data Science and Research Implementation*

-   Design and develop data science pipelines to improve the coverage and quality of the data
-   Working as an honest broker for research data focusing on electronic health records
-   Running ETL pipelines for [OneFlorida+](https://onefloridaconsortium.org), [All of Us Research Program](https://allofus.nih.gov) and [AoU CLAD](https://allofus.nih.gov/funding-and-program-partners/center-for-linkage-and-aquisition-of-data), [National COVID Cohort Collaborative- N3C](https://ncats.nih.gov/research/research-activities/n3c) and other custom requests
-   Adding new elements to source databases
-   Develop software and packages to run and validate data in OMOP Common Data Model
-   Conduct i2b2 and OMOP ATLAS trainings and workshops for hospital and research partners

##### [Data Management Analyst II]{.underline}

*UF Department of Epidemiology*

-   Lead Statistician on projects with NIH, NCATS, CDC and NIDA to design targeted interventions
-   Creating visualizations, hotspots and heatmap analysis for community intervention planning
